section.title: Submit button label
section.description: Specifies the label of the submit button.

section.title: Delete check box label
section.description: Specifies the label of the delete check box.

section.title: Has Cancel button
section.description: Specifies whether the grid has a cancel button.

section.title: Cancel button label
section.description: Appears is Has Cancel button is selected. Specifies the label of the cancel button.

section.title: Confirm before submit
section.description: Specifies whether the user must confirm changes before they are submitted.

section.title: Confirm message
section.description: The message displayed in the confirm message box.

section.title: Target page
section.description: The next page to display if the update is successful. Clicking the button next to the Target page property will display the Specify Target Page dialog. The Target page can be a specified full URL, return to 'this' page, or a .A5W or .HTML page from your project. Make a selection and click OK . The target page will appear if the update is successful.
